price: Akuo mmienu yi (agyidiefoͻ ne kaafirfoͻ) mfatoho tesε Onifirani ne nea n’aso asie, εna obi a ohunu adeε ne obia ͻte asεm. Enti wͻn mfatoho yε pε? Adεn, momfa nyԑ afutuo?
arabic: ۞ مَثَلُ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ كَٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡأَصَمِّ وَٱلۡبَصِيرِ وَٱلسَّمِيعِۚ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mathalu al-farīqayni kal-aʿmā wal-aṣami wal-baṣīri wal-samīʿi hal yastawiyāni mathalan afalā tadhakkarūna
